name: @chaim/cli
description: Schema-driven code generation tool for DynamoDB - Pure TypeScript CLI

scripts.build: npm run build:deps && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:deps: npm run bundle:client-java && npm run bundle:bprint-spec && npm run bundle:cdk
scripts.bundle:client-java: mkdir -p bundled-deps && cp -r ../chaim-client-java/dist bundled-deps/client-java && cp -r ../chaim-client-java/build bundled-deps/client-java-build
scripts.bundle:bprint-spec: mkdir -p bundled-deps && cp -r ../chaim-bprint-spec/dist bundled-deps/bprint-spec && cp -r ../chaim-bprint-spec/schema bundled-deps/bprint-spec-schema
scripts.clean: npm run clean:cli && npm run clean:deps

author: Chaim Builder
